channel.title: Making New Private Servers | Looking for Coders | Also Need Suggestions
channel.description:
-I am making a official private server for a website called rsportal and im looking for some help. I need help on which name i should make it, what type of server, and what to have on it. I spent over 50 bucks already to set things up but the coders just left because they said they wanted to own it. I offered them co-owner but as he is a mod in the forums he acts all cocky and threatens to ban me which i got him demoted. Now im looking for serious people to help.
-new team members will need to post their skills
With that in mind, I have decided to start creating a new, well designed server.
Who we are looking for
At the moment, we need (quite obviously) more programmers. Although someone with molding experience would be especially nice, I know that being that strict I won't find anyone.
What you get
A great pay and more. Of course, we are a team, so you will get credits for what you do as well.
- WILLINGNESS TO LEARN, and to become a good programmer.
- ABILITY TO FOLLOW my advice / RuneEmu design.
- Passing ONE of the following tests:
Contact me
msn: admin@iportal317.com
About me
I was known on rsbot for the best hacker and ever had it verified by admins. I single handed went by every p server site and hacked others sites not for bad reasons but to help them fix their security. i made over 7k in a month by helping many people.
The Current Team
-Me (Buying the domain and Hosting)
Post here if you would like to join or suggestions

item.title: Making New Private Servers | Looking for Coders | Also Need Suggestions
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Koolvin:

[shadow=#cccccc,top]He’s obviously not a hacker, he has terrible grammar, can’t even find his way around a keyboard.[/shadow]

That means nothing, you can hack without having good grammar.

Also this should be in the Team development since your asking for a team and showing this off as a team.

Read full topic
